bio.name: Tanishk Khare
bio.summary: A passionate software developer dedicated to creating innovative solutions for real-world challenges. I leverage my skills in computer science to build efficient and effective applications. I enjoy exploring new technologies and continuously improving my craft to make a positive impact through software.

projects.title: Voice Portfolio AI
projects.description: An interactive portfolio that simulates a voice call interface powered by OpenAI's API, featuring speech-to-text and text-to-speech integration for seamless AI conversations. It responds with accurate personal information configured from structured JSON data.

projects.title: Course Selling App
projects.description: A full-stack web application for selling courses with user authentication, course listing, and admin dashboard. Designed to be scalable and optimized for real-world users.

experience.description: Built two full-stack applications from scratch, including an AI-powered voice portfolio and a course-selling web app. Managed frontend and backend development, API integration, and optimized UX for real users.

education.institution: Shri Shankaracharya Mahavidyalaya, Hemchand Yadav University
education.details: Currently pursuing BCA with a comprehensive focus on software development, database management, and IT project management.

Active member of 100xDevs, a renowned coding community led by Harkirat Singh. Engaged in collaborative projects, hackathons, and open-source contributions, enhancing practical skills in full-stack development, DevOps, and Web3 technologies.

certifications.title: CS50x: Introduction to Computer Science
certifications.details: Completed Harvard's rigorous CS50x course covering foundational computer science concepts including algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and web development.
